<JD_START>
Job Title: Vehicle Field Inspector

Location: Burbank, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Overview

E INC is the parent company of EBlock and EDealer, unifying our approach to products, services, and strategies under one Vision and one Mission: to create the best digital auction and retailing platform in the world by connecting the automotive wholesale and retail experiences. Our brands and their technologies make it easy for a vehicle to move between buyers and sellers throughout its entire ownership lifecycle. Learn more at https://www.eblock.com/en-us.

We’re currently looking for a Vehicle Field Inspector to join our team in Van Nuys, CA.

The primary responsibility of an Inspector is to conduct a comprehensive inspection of assigned vehicles and generate a Condition Report (CR) that accurately reflects the vehicle’s condition. Assigned vehicles are typically located at dealerships but may occasionally be done at one of our facilities. This position requires a willingness to travel to perform responsibilities, a keen attention to detail as well as the ability to build strong relationships with customers. May perform other, job-related activities as needed to support the business.

Responsibilities

What You Will Do:

Conduct vehicle inspections at a variety of locations including dealerships, physical auctions, and off-site locations.Identify, assess, and document structural damage, frame condition, previous and substandard paintwork, alignment of vehicle body panels, detect missing parts and mechanical problems, etc.Utilize training and industry best practices while also adhering to management-provided work instructions and/or procedures regarding inspections and associated documentation.Develop strong relationships with customers through regular interaction to ensure we meet/exceed their expectations.Ensure a high level of accuracy to minimize arbitrations.Follow all applicable safety and health related procedures.May be required to locate, start, and move vehicles, if directed.Perform miscellaneous duties as assigned.


Qualifications

What You Will Need:

Minimum of a High School Diploma or equivalent.1-3 years’ experience in the automotive industry preferred.Problem solving aptitude to meet challenges with resourcefulness and innovative approaches.Proven success to work independently with minimal supervision while working in a team environment.Must be at least 21 years of age, have reliable transportation to travel to and from assignments, possess a valid driver's license and a clean driving record.Able to drive both manual and automatic transmission vehicles.Working knowledge of web-based applications and automotive inspection tools preferred.Must be detail-oriented, ability to provide exceptional customer service and be dependable.


What We Offer

Competitive payMedical, Dental & Vision401k/RSP with MatchCompany paid Group Life/AD&D insurancePaid time offFlexible working environmentContinuous LearningAnd an amazing culture to top it all off!


At E INC, in the spirit of pay transparency, we are excited to share our base pay as it is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. The hourly pay range for this full-time position is $21.00 - $25.00, and this role may be eligible for discretionary bonuses or commission payments. Your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. In addition, our ranges are determined by role, level, and location.

E INC is an equal opportunity employer and affirmatively seeks diversity in its workforce. E INC recruits qualified applicants and advances in employment its employees without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, disability, genetic information, ethnic or national origin, marital status, veteran status, or any other categories protected by law.

E INC takes cybersecurity seriously. For awareness, all active job openings are listed on our careers page, here: https://careers.eblock.com/careers-home/. E INC will reach out to candidates via our Application Tracking System iCIMS, LinkedIn, and Indeed, through company accounts. E INC does not require bank information, date of birth, social identification information, or upfront fees as part of our application process.

E INC., together with our EBlock and EDealer brands, is creating the best digital auction and retailing platform in the world. To do that we need people who are ready, willing, and able to develop, deliver, and relentlessly refine every aspect of the online buying experience. If you’re interested in putting your talent and passion to work for one of the fastest-growing companies in North America, we'd love to talk.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
